content: skip single_crochet around to beginning ending with chain 2 double_crochet in beginning single_crochet turn mark the center double_crochet of the sleeve the double_crochet in the decrease you will put addi9onal decrease dcs in round 2-15 chain 1 * single_crochet in chain space chain 5 skip single_crochet around to the last full chain 5 space before marked side decrease double_crochet single_crochet in chain space chain 2 skip chain space double_crochet in double_crochet chain 2 skip chain space skip single_crochet over side decrease round repeat from * once over second side decrease * single_crochet in chain space chain 5 skip single_crochet around to beginning end with chain 2 double_crochet in beginning single_crochet turn aler round 15 you should have a total of 32 loops round 16-20 chain 1 single_crochet in chain space chain 5 skip single_crochet around end with chain 2 double_crochet in beginning single_crochet turn adjust for waist length if desired this pabern is very stretchy fasten_off weave ends and block for best results thank you for your purchase when you make your own i d love to see your results email me photos at daogier@gmail com and keep an eye on my ravelry store for more star trek inspired paberns i have many coming live long and prosper the game sweater pa-ern by denise ogier please do not reproduce 11
